headline: Big Tech earnings: What to expect from the Mag 7 on AI this week
summary: Big Tech is on deck for earnings season with Magnificent Seven companies Meta Platforms (META), Microsoft (MSFT), and Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG) reporting quarterly results on Wednesday, and Amazon (AMZN) and Apple (AAPL) publishing their releases on Thursday. Yahoo Finance tech editor Dan Howley highlights what he will be watching from these Big Tech players, including Microsoft's perspective on OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) and the sector's broad CapEx spending trends into artificial intelligence. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Morning Brief.
